summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1, 2, 3 and the north 15 feet of Lot 4, Block 3, Wassom's Addition to Ravenna Park and Lots 9 and 10, Block 3, Ayer & O'Hara's Addition, with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-314.
